description:
The finals have started and Domon`s first opponent is Zeus Gundam, the favorite to win the championship. Domon is restless, so he goes through Neo Hong Kong looking for a place to stay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Weapon! Erupting Burning Finger
Eine neue Waffe! Der ausbrechende God Finger!!
L’atout suprême ! Le foudroyant God Finger
新必殺技! 爆熱ゴッド・フィンガー!!
